reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Capacity Building in Monitoring and Evaluation in Mongolia

description.narrative: Within the framework of the on-going education policy review and preparation of the 10 year education sector Master Plan for Mongolia, this capacity building project in Monitoring and evaluation funded by World Bank GPE is initiated to contribute to the strengthening of the institutional capacity in M & E and establishment of the Institutional mechanism for Ministry of Education in Mongolia. The capacity building workshop in M & E will contribute to the Ministry of Education preparing the M & E framework. for the 10 year education sector master plan.The activity will be implemented in close partnership with the Ministry of education and development partners.

participating-org.narrative: World Bank - Global Partnership for Education

organisation.narrative: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)
